resources.string: It empowers girls and women in rural tribal parts of India to make a choice-A Choice to Live With Dignity,Independence and Freewill which is a birthright of any human being. This enables one to build their self-confidence and be financially empowered and therefore be respected and not live a life of meek submissivenes at the hands of others.It is a myth that a girl/woman cannot fulfill her dreams and aspirations and live a balanced life as well.It is important make efforts to empower yourself as "God helps those who help themselves". Overcome your challenges like Jaswantiben Popat 94 year old Padma Shri Awardee and co founder of Lijjat Papad-who started this business in 1959 with a sum of rs 80 to grow into a company with a net worth of 1,600 crores.
Welcome to Kavach-Edu App \nPlease select a language
Kavach-Edu App वर आपले स्वागत आहे \n \कृपया भाषा निवडा
Kavach-Edu ऐप में आपका स्वागत है \nकृपया कोई भाषा चुनें
